title: Top 20 free agents of 2016
itunes:title: Top 20 free agents of 2016
description:
A room filled with heroes – Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Chris Wesseling, Marc Sessler and Colleen Wolfe – discuss the latest news from around the NFL, including the Bengals announcing quarterback Andy Dalton won’t need surgery on his thumb, and Colts head coach Chuck Pagano addressing his own job security. Then, the heroes look ahead to next season to discuss the best free agents of 2016 before checking in with East Coast Correspondent Connor Orr for an update on his Madden franchise.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
